short_summary: A piecework based contract to provide software and contract services
description: The Future Aircrew Training (FAcT) Program has awarded a contract to SkyAlyne Inc..
tags: cela-excludes department data but it does includes everything else in this output
full_summary:
**Future Aircrew Training Program Tender Announcement**
=================================================

**Title** (English): Future Aircrew Training Program TBIPS Requirement
**Title** (French): Exigence de Programme de formation du personnel navigant a l'avenir SPICT

**Reference Number**: cb-921-60687805
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Solicitation Number**: W847A-250402
**Publication Date**: 2024-06-21
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-23 16:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-08-12
**Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-08-11

**Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

**Procurement Category**: SRV
**Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
**Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif (Competitive - Selective Tendering)
**Selection Criteria**: Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix (Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price)

**Regions of Opportunity**: Ottawa
**Regions of Delivery**: Région de la capitale nationale (National Capital Region (NCR)), Canada

**Contracting Entity Name**: Défense nationale (National Defense)
**Contact Information**:
- Name: Andrew McMillan
- Email: andrew.mcmillan@forces.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 574-1876

**Tender Description**:

The Future Aircrew Training (FAcT) Program aims to develop and implement a new and cohesive training program for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). The program will replace the existing Pilot, Air Combat Systems Officer, and Airborne Electronic Sensor Operator training systems. The FAcT program will ensure a relevant, flexible, responsive, and effective aircrew training system capable of producing sufficient New Wing Graduates to meet future Defence Policy tasks. 

The program will be implemented at three locations: 17 Wing Winnipeg, 15 Wing Moose Jaw, and Southport Aerospace Centre. A contractor is required to act as liaison between the end-client, the FAcT team, key stakeholders, and the System Implementor.

**Attachments**:
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40649/fact-tbips-rfp-npp-v2_1.pdf
